The claim is based on a headline from th: a British newspaper, stating that NASA is tracking a 4KM killer rock that could end human civilization.
The headline is flagged by Facebook as p: 3. The article itself contradicts the sensationalist headline by stating that the asteroid will safely pass Earth by 3.9 million miles.
NASA: s Center for Near Earth Object Studies in Pasadena, Calif., confirms that they are tracking the asteroid 1998 OR2, estimating its diameter to be up to 4.1 kilometers.
